The Developer shall design, develop, test, and deliver a mobile application for iOS 
and Android platforms, tentatively named "FreshHarvest" (the ‚ÄúSoftware‚Äù)

ACCEPTANCE TESTING

functions in accordance with the specifications in the SOW

o FreshHarvest  Organics  Pvt. Ltd.

For FreshHarvest  Organics  Pvt. Ltd.
o Director  
For CodeGenius  Infotech  LLP
2. Purpose: The Software Development Agreement (the ‚Äú Agreement ‚Äù) is entered into on this 22nd day of August, 2025.
3. Term: This Agreement is effective for 4 Weeks from the Effective Date.
4. Confidentiality obligations continue for 10 Weeks after termination.
5. The Software Development Agreement (the ‚Äú Agreement ‚Äù) is entered into on this 22nd day of August, 2025.
6. The Software sha ll be deemed accepted if the Client does not provide any notice of non -conformity within the Acceptance Period.

CONFIDENTIALITY
